metadataAttributes.Title: The Art & Science of Product Management
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Sponsored by AMAZON WEB SERVICES (AWS). Learn how Amazon, Facebook, Google, and Twitch PMs and lead and collaborate with an interdisciplinary team of UX designers, software engineers, AI/ML engineers. Plus, practice real PM interview questions asked by Microsoft, Google, and Amazon!
metadataAttributes.Skills: Lead Designers,Lead Engineers,Technical PM Interview,Technical Literacy,AI/ML,
